sentence.Network_en: I can't claim infallibility for this method.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不敢说这方法绝对有效.

sentence.Network_en: Parents would be greatly surprised and deeply touched if they realized how belief their children usually have in their character and infallibility.
sentence.Network_cn: …如果父母意识到孩子通常多么相信父母的品格和父母的绝对正确,他们会大大震惊和深深被感动的… …

sentence.Network_en: I've finally nailed the myth of his infallibility, ie shown that he can make mistakes.
sentence.Network_cn: 我终于揭穿了他‘一贯正确’的神话(表明他也会犯错误).

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念第四册单词总汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... credibility 可信性 infallibility 一贯正确 responsibility 责任.
我们可以分辨无谬（infallibility）和无误（inerrancy），但二者不能分别而论。第十二条：我们坚信，圣经全部无误，绝无谬论、欺骗 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I) ... infall 汇流处 infallibility 绝无错误 infallible 没有错误的.
认信圣经无误的意义与当... ... 《圣经》的必需性( necessity) 《圣经》的无谬无误性( infallibility) 《圣经》的清晰性( perspicuity).

list.abs: ...圣经真理无误（Biblical infallibility），又译为圣经无谬论、圣经无谬说，一种基督教神学上的观点。这派的支持者认为，在关于基督信仰以及信仰的实践上，圣经是完全没有错误的，足以作为信仰及生活方式的指引；但是在其他的部份，如历史与科学的部份，则不保证它完全不可能出错。与它相对的，则是圣.
inextricable 不能解决的infallible data 可靠数据infancy 婴儿期
教皇无误论 (Papal infallibility)[quote]原帖由 [i]vistaxp[/i] 于 2009-3-19 10:26 PM 发表 [url=http://www.discuss.com.hk/redi.
...authority or function），包括教宗无误论（papal infallibility）即钦定信条（dogmatic definition）——教宗作为可见的教会领导庄重提.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from obsolete French infallibilité or medieval Latin infallibilitas (based on Latin fallere 'deceive')

entry.tran: 不可能错的;不会犯错误的;永无过失的
entry.def: If a person or thing is infallible, they are never wrong.

example.ex: Although he was experienced, he was not infallible...
example.tran: 尽管他经验丰富,却并非不会出错。

example.ex: She had an infallible eye for style.
example.tran: 在时尚方面她的眼光错不了。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of never making an error

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was no external peer review; infallibility was assumed.

auth_sentence.content: Consider the infallibility of the church.
